name: Fey Drake

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The fey drake has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Superior Invisibility
text: As a bonus action, the fey drake can magically turn invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the drake wears or carries is invisible with it.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The fey drake's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: charm person, color spray, grease
3/day each: hypnotic pattern, locate creature, suggestion

action.name: Multiattack
text: The fey drake makes three bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit.
10 (2d4 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour.

action.name: Bewildering Breath (Recharge 5-6)
text: The drake breaths a plume of purple gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. While charmed, the creature can't take bonus actions or reactions, and it makes all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma skill checks and saving throws with disadvantage.

spells: charm person, color spray, grease, hypnotic pattern, locate creature, suggestion, dominate person, polymorph
